description:
### What will i learn? 
 * HTML 
 * CSS 
 * JS (BASIC) 
 * Adobe Photoshop (option) 
 * Adobe Illustrator (option) 
 * Adobe Xd (option) 
 * [Build Instagram Redesign](https://sanlinhtik3.github.io/ig-redesign/) 
 ### Who is the target audience? 
 * Anyone who wants to learn to create websites, be it beginner or intermediate programmer. 
 * If you want to start your carrier as a frontend web developer, HTML is a must alone with other technologies. 
 * If you wnat to make beautiful and responsive website, then this course is a must. 
 ### Benefits 
 * HTML is fun to write and easy to get started with, no need to set up compiler or the environment. 
 * Nowadays every business, be it small or large needs a website, so there is a lot of opportunity for a web developer 
 ### Requirement 
 * You won't need to know anything before taking this course 
 * Engerness to learn, and make awesome website 
 * Nothing else it's just you, your computer and your hunger to get started tody.

lessons.title: Unit 1 : How to ask a letter?
